short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically closes the specified tabs. For example, close the Zoom/Slack tab after clicking a link and the app opens.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically closes the specified tabs. For example, when clicking a Zoom link, Zoom will open a tab, then open the app, and leave the tab open. This extension can be used to close that tab. 

The list of sites to close can be configured.
